CSS
Create and Learn
CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout HTML elements on a webpage. It controls everything from fonts and colors to positioning, animations, and responsiveness.
CSS brings life to web pages by adding style, color, and design. It allows developers to create responsive layouts that adapt to any screen. With features like animations and transitions, CSS enhances user experience beautifully.
CSS separates content from design, making code cleaner and more manageable. It supports powerful tools like Flexbox and Grid for building complex layouts. From simple color tweaks to dynamic animations, CSS shapes the entire visual web.
